content.raw:
This doesn't tie to a specific issue. With less than a month to go could we get a summary from the simulation development team on what to expect? 

* Can we get a freeze date on changes to the simulation software except for any bugs that make completion impossible?

* Can we get a delivery date for final changes and what those will be?

A question asked but buried in one of the scoring discussions is:

* What exactly does position mean for qual1? Is it the center of the light, a corner, or what? 

Finally, when you release a new package could you tell us this happened and what changed?
content.html:
This doesn't tie to a specific issue. With less than a month to go could we get a summary from the simulation development team on what to expect?

  • Can we get a freeze date on changes to the simulation software except for any bugs that make completion impossible?

  • Can we get a delivery date for final changes and what those will be?

A question asked but buried in one of the scoring discussions is:

  • What exactly does position mean for qual1? Is it the center of the light, a corner, or what?

Finally, when you release a new package could you tell us this happened and what changed?
